ED_Title: Document considered by the General Assembly in connection with the question of crime prevention and criminal justice
ED_DecisionText:
At its 73rd meeting, on 19 December 2017, the General Assembly, on the recommendation of the Third Committee,  took note of the note by the Secretary-General transmitting the report of the Conference of the Parties to the United Nations Convention against Transnational Organized Crime on its eighth session, held in Vienna from 17 to 21 October 2016, submitted under the item entitled “Crime prevention and criminal justice”.


(See A/72/440, para. 21; A/72/PV.73)
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/72/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
